name: Idle Evil Clicker
description:
Do you like farming games, but farms make you yawn? Here’s a new and revolutionary way to build and keep building! It’s fun, simple, and awesome! Check out "Idle Hell Clicker!"

Forget about the endless grind and other mundane chores! Idle Hell Clicker is a HELL TYCOON SIMULATOR! Build instruments of torture, hire demons, and keep farming those souls! Buildawaygame have never been this unusual and funny! Upgrade and automate your equipment, invest in sins, and earn more - create your very own demonic empire!

This is a new generation of idle clicker! Wanna be the Devil? Here’s your chance! Tap! Build! Invest! Upgrade!

WHAT’S SO GREAT ABOUT "Idle Hell Clicker"?
- You can build the weirdest and most darkly magical things ever! Fill your demonic pit with fire!
- Diversity! Sinners come in many races and forms – Hell welcomes all!
- It is all about fun! A pure farming experience with funny crops and easy-to-pick-up gameplay.
- Awesome art and animation! The best idle miner ever!
- It's a revolution in tycoon simulators! Tap away all your sorrows!
- A whole lot of upgrades!
- Idle clickers are awesome! So join the big community of fans who love this genre! Upgrade, upgrade, upgrade! Swipe, click, tap and swipe some more!
- We made this game with love and care! Even more than the last one!

Strap in for the best building simulator of your life!
Ready! Steady! Tap! Tap-tap!
